      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      abstract void intercept(ActionContext ctx, InterceptorChain chain)
      Do intercept and invoke chain.doInterceptor() to process next interceptor.

    • 方法详细资料

      • intercept

        public abstract void intercept(ActionContext ctx,
             InterceptorChain chain)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Do intercept and invoke chain.doInterceptor() to process next interceptor. NOTE that process will not continue if chain.doInterceptor() method is not invoked.
        参数:
        chain - Interceptor chain.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - If any exception is thrown, process will not continued.
